data.description:
In a world filled with legends, a ruthless master has risen and shaken the balance of power. Ambitious masters seek to prove themselves, vengeful emperors scheme to crush any threat to their rule, and wronged peasants sharpen their blades. 

They all have something to prove, and the only way to settle it?
# **Kung Fu.**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031434_1207107503870359_5082224991983973730_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kuX4Ad-RNYQQ7kNvgHfs5X6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agu84HmJOfx26sxTRrqiUx3&oh=00_AYDro3HbE0IeEBhnWofZ3DQEIWdxUZaGG81c0NhMIBlY3A&oe=66F3F548)
# Step into your own Kung Fu movie with legendary characters inspired by martial arts movies across the decades. 
{354077967776881}
# Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu features both **single and multiplayer** modes! 
Play solo in a full campaign featuring multiple levels, unlockable characters, diverse game modes, and training areas. Play up to 8 person multiplayer with PVP, Co-op, and other multiplayer gamemodes.  
{8170592266361540}
# Choose from over 40 different characters with unique special moves!
Every character has their own fighting style to master as well as their own perks and weaknesses.
{1903052986827168}
Face opponents wielding real-world martial arts techniques. Learn to react and anticipate their attacks, countering and striking back with your unique style. Using real pressure points and physics, you have full control over how you'll defeat your enemies. Remember: All opponents have the same control as you!
{808577998151364}
